pr_title: Update to the new Tagliatelle engine.

timeline.message: Ports sirius-biz to the new Tagliatelle.

Removes unnecessary classes lists in @Register annotations.

LoadInfoProvider has been made @AutoRegister recently.

Removes unnecessary classes lists in @Register annotations.

LoadInfoProvider has been made @AutoRegister recently.
Updates to the latest s3ninja (within the dev and test environment).
